content: loaf cat<3 by ellieloveshorses pattern 1 all one color cat materials any yarn color you would like for your kitty black or pink for the mouth 4 0mm hook or 3 5mm hook safety eyes size is your choice i like to use one color any to embroider around the eyes but its optional stuffing stitch marker scissors needle abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase chain chain round s round s 5dc bobble 5 double_crochet bobble decrease decrease lets get started all one color cat rnd1 6 single_crochet into the magic_ring rnd2 increase all around rnd3 single_crochet increase rnd4 single_crochet 2 increase rnd5 single_crochet 3 increase rnd6 4 single_crochet increase place your safety eyes between rnds 3-4 and embroider the mouth and if you want some color around the eyes rnd7 single_crochet to the top of your head and to make the ears chain 3 in the second chain from the hook slip_stitch and in the last chain make a half_double_crochet then single_crochet into the front loop only in the next stitch single_crochet to the next side and place another ear i like to have my ears 7 stitches apart but thats optional single_crochet down the side and when you get close to the bottom make a 5dcbobble for the foot i did have to move my stitch marker down a couple stitches rnd8 single_crochet to the other side and make another 5dcbobble for the other foot when i crochet my feet i like to match it up with my ears single_crochet back to the stitch marker and when you reach the ear just single_crochet into those back loops that you left out if that makes sense rnds8-16 single_crochet for 8 rnds round 17 single_crochet to match your other feet and do a 5dcbobble for the back feet single_crochet to the next side and repeat to make the other foot single_crochet back to the stitch marker to finish the round you can so 1 more round of single_crochet before you start to decrease but its up to you round 18 single_crochet 4 decrease round 19 single_crochet around round 20 single_crochet 3 decrease stuff firmly round 22 single_crochet 2 decrease round 24 single_crochet decrease round 26 decrease all around round 27 single_crochet around fasten_off tail rnd1 6 single_crochet into the magic_ring rnd2 single_crochet increase rnds2-8 single_crochet for 6 rnds fasten_off stuff sew your cat tail to your cat body any way you want and you are done siamese cat materials brown and cream color yarn i only had white yarn black or pink for the mouth 4 0mm hook or 3 5mm hook safety eyes size is your choice i like to use one color any to
